title: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
description: Tavern Rumble is a strategy roguelike deckbuilding card game. Begin your adventure with basic mercenary cards, strengthen your deck, and face challenging bosses. Explore card synergies and experience a roguelike journey with random dungeons, loot, mercenaries, and permanent death. Craft a unique deck, encounter creatures, take blessings, and become a legendary monster slayer. The game offers playable classes, cute pixel art, easy-to-learn mechanics, and the ability to play offline or online. Play now for a perfect card game break!
